head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOGATIN, PHILIP F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOGATIN, PHILIP F.

block.p: BOGATIN--Philip F. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Philip Bogatin, father of Jeffery Bogatin and father-inlaw of Susan Bogatin, cherished friends of the New York Jewish community. Susan, as a UJA-Federation board member, and Jeffery, as a former board member, together have set a profound example of philanthropic leadership deeply affecting our community and enriching the lives of millions. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Susan and Jeffery; to their children, Rachel and Edmund Solarsh and Rebecca Bogatin; and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
